nodes.text: BioTech Industries was a company that produced cybernetic technology, including the novic patellar, which powered the joint of a 66K cybernetic leg. They sold novic patellars only in the Core Worlds and Colonies. Because of this, although she needed a novic patellar for her cybernetic leg, the smuggler Riley did not have access to one. In place of the BioTech novic patellar, she used a Lotho Junker omnislug. She recorded her frustration over the limited availability of the company's product in the pirate Maz Kanata's Smuggler's Guide.
During the Galactic Civil War, a members of the Imperial Information Office used BioTech technology to become more efficient, although doing so occasionally caused mental damage.
BioTech Industries was first mentioned in canon in the first issue of the magazine series Star Wars Helmet Collection, released in 2016.
